claim: A flow-chart detailing all exclusions is available in Fig. 1.
title: Fig. 1.
caption: Flow-chart for trial inclusion. ICTRP, International Clinical Trials Registry Platform. Cross-registrations include those identified in automated and manual screening of registries and publications

claim: Figure 4 shows the delay from preprint to full journal publication for all preprints; journal articles published prior to preprints were set to time 0, and preprints without a journal publication were censored at the start of result searches.
title: Fig. 4.
caption: Time from preprint to journal publication

claim:
Subgroup analyses
Figure 5a shows time to reporting stratified by whether trials completed in the early, middle, or late periods of the first 18 months of the COVID-19 pandemic.
title: Fig. 5.
caption: A–C Time to dissemination by subgroups. A 6-month phase of the pandemic. B Top 5 common interventions. C Based on trial design standards. HCQ: Hydroxychloroquine; Con. Plasma: Convalescent Plasma

claim: Figure 5b shows how this compares to trials without these characteristics.
title: Fig. 5.
caption: A–C Time to dissemination by subgroups. A 6-month phase of the pandemic. B Top 5 common interventions. C Based on trial design standards. HCQ: Hydroxychloroquine; Con. Plasma: Convalescent Plasma
